name: bootstrap
description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.
author: The Bootstrap Authors (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/graphs/contributors)

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 flask_application/bower_components/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap.scss flask_application/static/css/bootstrap.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 flask_application/bower_components/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap-grid.scss flask_application/static/css/bootstrap-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 flask_application/bower_components/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap-reboot.scss flask_application/static/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
